import React from 'react'; import { Dropdown } from 'carbon-components-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Restart16, ArrowRight16 } from '@carbon/icons-react'; import moment from 'moment'; import './overview-page.scss' import PercentRing from "../components/PercentRing" export default class OverviewPage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { lastUpdated: moment().format('h:mm A') } } render() { const dividerStyle = {width: "100%", height: "1px", background: "#f4f4f4", marginTop: "24px"} return
